inputs.name: pull_target
inputs.description: How many pulls should simulation make

inputs.name: target_rate_up_number
inputs.description: Target number of Rate-Up character copies per banner

inputs.name: batch_distance
inputs.description: How far away do you want to stay away from the common pity (80) when you stop pulling in batches. 0 means always pull in batch, 80 means always pull one by one. If you didn't pick 0, algorithm will stop pull in batches earlier to evade pulling Rate-Up pity (120) in batch
